system.description:
At 2nd level, you have learned to harness certain energies that are normally frowned upon by other druids. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.bpkked98u8mb2q3w]{Chill Touch} cantrip. This does not count against your total number of cantrips known.

Furthermore, at the corresponding levels, the following spells are added to the druid list for you. You always have these spells prepared, and they do not count against your druid spells prepared.

3rd

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.5qkmd21kyg7vedcz]{Inflict Wounds}

5th

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.xs292gklnxyaeuyx]{Animate Dead}

7th

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.2q65v0xklhfx73to]{Blight}

9th

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.10a7cken5ktbtnus]{Antilife Shell}

11th

@UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.evhh5s6v0ctzop82]{Create Undead}
